Speaker: Being unconscious will not lessen the crime. Report sleep singers immediately.
Possessing singing birds is a crime.
Do you think you’re a good citizen? Think again. Look into the good citizen’s handbook. Handbooks are available in all government check points.
Reporting is good for society and every citizen should work to society’s benefit.
The police are your friends, the Tune terrorist is not. Report suspicious individuals to: 555-0101.
Guards are being hired. The applicants’ as well as their close relatives’ backgrounds will be checked. For more information, call 555-0110.
The meetings of three or more people are illegal gatherings.
The right to each household’s own phone must be earned.
Punctuality. Diligence. Effectiveness. On those we shall build a society we can be proud of.
Unlicensed public performances are banned (under the threat of a fine.)
